validation.message: Please see individual checks for details

checks.message: Fields 'file_r1' and 'file_r2' should NOT be the same for paired end FASTQ sequencing reads in read group: D0RE2.1.
FASTQ file(s) duplicated in 'file_r1/file_r2' of the 'read_groups' section in the metadata: 'D0RE2.1_r1.fq.gz, D0RH0.2_r1.fq.gz'

All files in the 'files' section of the metadata JSON are required to have 'info.data_category' field being populated with 'Sequencing Reads'. File(s) found not conforming to this requirement: 'C0HVY.2_r1.fq.gz, C0HVY.2_r2.fq.gz, D0RE2.1_r1.fq.gz, D0RE2.1_r2.fq.gz, D0RH0.2_r1.fq.gz, D0RH0.2_r2.fq.gz'.

All files in the 'files' section of the metadata JSON are required to have 'dataType' field being populated with 'Submitted Reads'. File(s) found not conforming to this requirement: 'C0HVY.2_r1.fq.gz, C0HVY.2_r2.fq.gz, D0RE2.1_r1.fq.gz, D0RE2.1_r2.fq.gz, D0RH0.2_r1.fq.gz, D0RH0.2_r2.fq.gz'.
